transportAdvice: Pattaya is served by shared songthaew (baht bus) routes that loop along the main beach road and connect key tourist areas at low cost, making them a practical option for short hops. Metered taxis and motorcycle taxis are widely available for longer journeys, though walking is feasible within compact areas like the beachfront strip.

weather.description: Cool and dry with plenty of sunshine, making it one of the most pleasant months to visit.
Warm and largely dry with low humidity, ideal beach weather continues.
Temperatures begin to climb and it remains mostly dry with strong sunshine.
Hot and humid with occasional afternoon showers as the wet season approaches.
Wet season begins with frequent afternoon and evening thunderstorms alongside high heat.
Regular heavy rain showers, though mornings are often clear before afternoon storms build.
Continued wet season with persistent humidity and frequent downpours, especially in the afternoon.
One of the wetter months with heavy rainfall and overcast skies common throughout the day.
Peak of the wet season with the highest monthly rainfall and consistently grey skies.
Rain begins to ease slightly toward month end but showers remain frequent and heavy.
Wet season winds down with noticeably less rain and more sunshine returning.
Dry and comfortable with cooler evenings, marking the start of the peak tourist season.
